lesson.en_hint: The picture shows about family riding bikes outside at the weekend with helmets...
She is going shopping with her boyfriend. And he is helping her to carrying shopping bags...
She is studying in the library. There is a lot of books in her table...
She can not drive beacause the tyre is punctured. Her baby is crying while she is calling for help...
The security guard is checking over the person and taking stuff apart on which they carried to check if the person has anything unallowed or dangerous...
There are three women. They are cooking in the kitchen. The oldest woman is between two others...
A girl is smelling a red tulip. Her hair is plaited...
The mother is giving her daughter a gift
The teacher is teaching Geography to her children.
She is swimming in the pool.
